#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int T, N, M, dp[2002][2002];
char A[2002], B[2002];

main()
{
    scanf("%d", &T);
    while (T--)
    {
        scanf("%s%s", A + 1, B + 1);
        N = strlen(A + 1);
        M = strlen(B + 1);

        for (int i = 1; i <= N; i++) dp[i][0] = i;
        for (int j = 1; j <= M; j++) dp[0][j] = j;
        for (int i = 1; i <= N; i++)
            for (int j = 1; j <= M; j++)
                dp[i][j] = min(min(dp[i][j - 1], dp[i - 1][j]) + 1, dp[i - 1][j - 1] + (A[i] != B[j]));

        printf("%d\n", dp[N][M]);
    }
}
